artiste: Various Artists, Jean (Hans) Arp, André Beaudin, Oscar Domínguez, Georges Braque, Marc Chagall, Max Ernst, Alberto Giacometti, Valentine Hugo, Henri Laurens, Fernand Léger, André Masson, Joan Miró, Pablo Picasso, Yves Tanguy, Jacques Villon
artisteBio: Various, French, born Germany (Alsace). 1886–1966, French, 1895–1975, French, born Spain. 1906–1957, French, 1882–1963, French, born Belarus. 1887–1985, French and American, born Germany. 1891–1976, Swiss, 1901–1966, French, 1890–1968, French, 1885–1954, French, 1881–1955, French, 1896–1987, Spanish, 1893–1983, Spanish, 1881–1973, American, born France. 1900–1955, French, 1875–1963
title: Un Poème dans chaque livre
medium: Illustrated book with seven etchings (three with aquatint, one with aquatint, drypoint, engraving, and roulette), three drypoints (one with engraving), two aquatints, two woodcuts, one engraving, and one lithograph
